title: Goa Eco-Friendly Villa Serenity near Candolim with Daily Breakfast & Drinks
description:
Discover the tropical wonders of India’s favourite beach town, Goa, with a serene stay at the hilltop Wildflower Villas near Candolim. Set on an eight-acre, 200-year-old forest estate, this boutique resort is dotted with seven strikingly beautiful Goan-style villas, each designed with eco-friendly luxury in mind. Peaceful seclusion, personalised hospitality and delicious local cuisine make this the ultimate Goa escape for tranquility seekers.

Let go of daily life at the treetop spa with indulgent massages, dig into flavoursome delicacies at the in-house restaurant or treat yourself to a local cycling or walking tour. The grounds provide endless wonders: a pearl in Candolim's oyster, the estate is home to a beautiful variety of colourful birds, butterflies and flora.

title: North Goa Boutique Escape with Daily Breakfast, One Beer Bucket & One Lunch & Dinner
description:
Tucked away in a quiet corner of North Goa's Mandrem, Amritara Aura Spa Retreat Goa is a serene and private escape. Surrounded by four acres of forest and orchards, this boutique hotel is an hour's drive from Goa International Airport (GOI). Unwind in total tranquillity in any of the beautifully designed rooms, cottages or villas, laze by the pool or make your way to the gorgeous Mandrem Beach (a 10-minute drive), or take advantage of the hotel's lavish in-house spa for a relaxing massage or two.

 If you're looking to rejuvenate from within, Amritara Aura Spa Retreat also boasts two yoga-shaalas. Take the first step towards holistic wellness with the help of yoga trainers and let go of all your stress. The perfect blend of nature, wellness and tropical bliss, Amritara Aura Spa Retreat Goa is the escape you need right now.
offer_address: H. No. 227, Madhalamaj, Mandrem, Goa 403512 India

title: Tranquil Goa Hilltop Escape
description: Discover the tropical wonders of India’s favourite beach town, Goa. Spend three nights at the hilltop Wildflower Villas near all the bars, restaurants and beach of Candolim and enjoy daily breakfasts, two three-course dining experiences and one nightly cocktail each.

title: North Goa Eco-Friendly Villa Stay near Candolim with Daily Breakfast, One Goan Lunch/Dinner & Drinks
description: Immerse yourself in the enchanting allure of Goa at the hilltop sanctuary of Wildflower Villas, nestled amidst an eight-acre, centuries-old forest estate near Candolim. This boutique retreat showcases seven exquisite Goan-style villas, each radiating eco-luxury and tranquillity. Experience unparalleled hospitality, savour delectable local cuisine, and surrender to the serenity of the treetop spa. Explore the vibrant flora and fauna on a leisurely cycle or walking tour, or simply unwind with a cocktail at the in-house tavern. This is the epitome of a Goa escape, where peace and luxury intertwine.

title: Boutique North Goa Escape with Daily Breakfast, One Dinner & Daily Drinks
description:
Immerse yourself in the untouched elegance of Goan luxury at Andores Resort & Spa, a five-star sanctuary nestled amidst the vibrant coconut groves of North Goa. This acclaimed retreat, a harmonious blend of traditional Goan architecture and modern sophistication, offers a tranquil haven from the world. Bask in the warmth of genuine Goan hospitality, luxuriate in the meticulously designed rooms, and indulge in Ayurvedic treatments at Kera Spa. Relish authentic Goan delicacies at Cinnamon restaurant, or unwind by the expansive pool adorned with sunken deck beds. 

Just a stroll away from Calangute Beach, this boutique hotel is your gateway to the treasures of North Goa. Explore the nearby Candolim and Baga beaches, or venture to the rugged beauty of Anjuna and Vagator beaches. Experience the pinnacle of Goan luxury in this serene oasis, where the sunset creates a stunning canvas against the lush tropical gardens, crafting an unforgettable escape.

title: Top-Rated Boutique North Goa Escape with Daily Breakfast & Daily Drinks
description:
Located in pristine North Goa amid coconut groves, Andores Resort & Spa is currently the top hotel in Calangute on Tripadvisor and rated within the top 10% of all properties worldwide.

This luxury boutique hotel combines heart-warming Goan hospitality with beautifully designed rooms, acclaimed dining, and easy access to popular beaches. Andores Resort & Spa is an oasis of calm, perfect for an intimate escape amid the hustle and bustle of busy Goa. Relax at Kera Spa with Ayurveda-inspired treatments, lounge by the expansive outdoor pool with sunken deck beds, or dine on Indian specialities at Cinnamon restaurant.

vendor_name: The Yellow House, Anjuna - IHCL Seleqtions
title: Charming North Goa Escape near Anjuna Beach with Daily Breakfast, One Dinner & Daily Drinks
description: Immerse yourself in the tropical allure of The Yellow House, Anjuna - IHCL Seleqtions, a boutique sanctuary nestled in the heart of North Goa's captivating Anjuna Beach. This five-star retreat, an exquisite blend of traditional Goan-Portuguese aesthetics and modern luxury, exudes an enchanting fusion of historic charm and contemporary elegance. Enclosed by verdant greenery, this rejuvenating haven offers an enticing pool, authentic Goan gastronomy, and tranquil rooms designed for ultimate relaxation. Just a stone's throw from the famed North Goa beaches, The Yellow House, Anjuna - IHCL Seleqtions is your exclusive gateway to the vibrant Goan culture, cuisine, and lifestyle.
location_description: The Yellow House, Anjuna - IHCL Seleqtions

title: Tranquil North Goa Escape with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch/Dinner & Daily Drinks
description:
Hidden within a four-acre landscape of forests and orchards, Amritara Aura Resort & Spa Goa is tucked away in a quiet corner of North Goa's Mandrem. A 45-minute drive from Mopa International Airport (GOX), this boutique property is a tranquil oasis with beauteous rooms and aesthetic villas emanating a vintage charm. With an inviting blue pool to unwind in and delectable Indian, Chinese and Continental cuisine to feast on at the all-day dining restaurant, Auram, the scenic property is ideal for both families as well as honeymooners who seek uninterrupted privacy. Indulge in therapeutic massage sessions at Prana Spa or connect with yourself with some yoga sessions at the dedicated yoga shalas and feel truly rejuvenated.

Lying close to the bustling beaches of North Goa - Ashwem, Arambol, Candolim, Calangute and Baga and heritage forts and churches, the boutique property enjoys an enviable location. An utopian blend of nature, wellness and beachside bliss, Amritara Aura Resort & Spa is the escape of your dreams.
offer_address: H. No. 227, Madhalamaj, Mandrem, Goa 403512 India

title: Lavish India Escape with Oasis-Style Pool & Al Fresco Dining
description: Discover the buzzing beaches, vibrant nightlife, and mouthwatering cuisines of North Goa with a stay at Holiday Inn Goa Candolim, an IHG Hotel. Set amid lush gardens and nodding palm trees, with a glistening pool at its centre, this lavish oasis offers multiple dining areas, and, of course, a poolside bar. Spend your evenings enjoying tropical cocktails, before heading to Viva restaurant for an al fresco dinner in the Indian breeze.
location_description: Holiday Inn Goa Candolim, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Survey No. 52/5 and 52/8, opposite Kingfisher Villa, North Goa, 403515 India
